title: Chinese noodles with chicken
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons rapeseed oil, divided', '2 courgettes, halved lengthways then sliced', '1 red pepper, julienned', '1 stick celery, sliced', '5 button mushrooms, finely chopped', '3 garlic cloves, minced', '4 individual packs of flavoured instant Chinese noodles', '4 chicken breast fillets, cut into strips', '3 tablespoons soy sauce']
